application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for condiotion 20 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 20/00555/FUL (Demolition of an existing single storey building and erection of a two storey building to accommodate 4x apartments and 4x outdoor parking spaces)
decision_conditions: The details submitted pursuant to Condition 20 (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission 20/00555/FUL, do not adequately detail wider access arrangements and are considered to have an unacceptable impact upon highway safety and the free flow of traffic in conflict with Paragraph 111 of the NPPF 2021 and Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
